consent.title: Nastroiki konfidentsialnosti
consent.desc: Neobyazatelnye nastroiki analitiki i reklamy vklyuchayutsya tolko s vashego razresheniya. Neobkhodimye funktsii vsegda aktivny.

legal.enFallbackNotice: Eta yuridicheskaya stranitsa poka dostupna na angliyskom, lokalizatsii gotovyatsya.

cookies.title: Politika cookie
cookies.openConsentCta: Vy mozhete obnovit nastroiki analitiki i reklamy v lyuboy moment.

errorPage.title: Chto-to poshlo ne tak
errorPage.description: Na stranitse voznikla nepredvidennaya oshibka. Vy mozhete vernutsya na glavnuyu ili izmenit nastroiki soglasiya.
errorPage.reportDisabled: Vklyuchite soglasie na analitiku, chtoby otpravit otchet ob oshibke.
errorPage.reportReady: Vy mozhete soobshit ob etoy probleme.

auth.registerDisabledBody: Account creation is paused in this environment.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Request a password reset link for your account email.
auth.forgotPasswordRequestFailed: Could not process your request right now. Please try again.
auth.forgotPasswordSuccessRedirect: If this email exists, reset instructions were sent. Redirecting to login...
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Set a new password using your reset token.
auth.resetTokenMissing: Reset token is missing. Please request a new reset link.
auth.resetPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
auth.resetPasswordFailed: Password reset failed. Please request a new link.

stateBanner.runtime: Pokazyvaetsya prevyu runtime-perevoda. Eta versiya ne indeksiruetsya.
stateBanner.fallback: Polnyy complete-kontent na etom yazyke poka nedostupen ({language}). Pokazyvaetsya kanonicheskaya complete-versiya.
stateBanner.incomplete: Kontent na etom yazyke ne complete ({language}, status: {state}). Pokazyvaetsya kanonicheskaya complete-versiya.
stateBanner.mock: Na etoy stranitse pokazany MOCK DATA. Eta versiya vsegda noindex.

blog.listHint: Posty vidny, dazhe esli perevod ne complete; nepolnye varianty ne indeksiruyutsya.

list.title: Atlas
list.description: Tochki vhoda po stranam v iyerarkhii Atlas.
list.emptyDescription: Poprobuyte drugoy chip-filtr, chtoby prodolzhit izuchenie atlasa.

helper.noOrigin: Vyberite punkt vyleta, chtoby otsenit varianty reysov.

list.title: Regiony
list.description: Stranitsy regionalnykh grupp po stranam bez izmeneniya bazovoy iyerarkhii.

uiPage.notFoundDescription: Etoy sistemnoy stranitsy poka net v Strapi.

account.title: Account
account.description: Obolochka akkaunta seychas rabotaet v read-only rezhime.
account.authStateBody: Seychas pokazana versiya bez vhoda. Public-registratsiya i personalnye dannye akkaunta soznatelno otklyucheny na etom etape.

roles.public: Public: chtenie Atlas/Blog/UI i otpravka Atlas-predlozheniy.
roles.user: Authenticated user: rezerv dlya budushchikh blog-submission i profile-funktsiy.
roles.editor: Editor/Admin: proverka i publikatsiya Atlas i Blog kontenta.

account.loginRequiredBody: You need to login before managing account preferences.
account.profileDescription: Basic account identity pulled from your authenticated session.
account.profileSyncFallback: Could not refresh profile from API. Showing local session snapshot.
account.languageDescription: This preference is saved to your account profile and overrides browser language.
account.passwordDescription: Update your account password. Use a strong password with at least 8 characters.
account.passwordLength: New password must be at least 8 characters.
account.passwordSameAsCurrent: New password must be different from current password.
account.passwordSaveFailed: Could not update password. Please verify your current password.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.readOnlyBody: Vidzhety dashboard ostayutsya ogranichennymi, poka user-submission funktsii ne vklyucheny.

ops.title: Ops Metrics
ops.subtitle: Internal aggregated metrics dashboard for local operations.

empty.title: No metrics collected yet
empty.desc: Run the metrics collector locally, then refresh this page.

disabled.title: Ops metrics viewer is disabled in this mode
disabled.desc: Set PUBLIC_OPS_MODE=local to allow local file reading in this environment.
